Text: RE SUNFLOWER NNG HOURLY xlsAlan from Sunflower called Gas Control this afternoon to let us know that they are going to do some testing tomorrow for approximately one hour starting at am Original Message From Bryan Randy Sent Thursday January AM To DLETS Gas Controllers Subject FW SUNFLOWER NNG HOURLY xls Original Message From Rodenburg Eric tiliCorpcomENRON Sent Thursday January AM To Schoolcraft Darrell Spraggins Gary Carr James Blair Jean Wilkens Jerry Clapper Karen Washington Kathy Callans Nancy Bryan Randy Walden Shirley Subject SUNFLOWER NNG HOURLY xls SUNFLOWER NNG HOURLY xls File SUNFLOWER NNG HOURLY xls

STORAGE NOTESStorage Notes January Cunningham Maximum Withdrawal mm Maximum Injection mm Redfield Target Maximum Withdrawal mm Minimum Injection mm Lyons mm Monday they would like to increase rate will need Bushton to add horsepower Garner York Rep will be there Monday Can vaporize at rates as low as mm if needed Wrenshall Liquefaction mm Maximum vaporization mm
Storage NotesWrenshall to Garner to Redfield withdrawal Cunningham withdrawal possibly if unit is fixed max injection Lyons

Mitchell EllenburgerThe valve that we openclose for the Mitchell Ellenburger plant is not working properly If we need to shutin the flow from the plant we will have to make a call out Al Haney is aware of the problem and will let us know when it is repaired gayle

HubbardPaul from Cornbelt Electric has line maintenance scheduled for tomorrow starting at AM for approximately hours During this time we will be limited to HP on the Hubbard unit Bob will limit the unit accordingly for us Thanks gayle

Citizens GriffithReceived a call from Tom Tucker approximately wanting to switch the fl ow from TW to El Paso for testing purposes Tom explained that it was warr anty work and the flow would only be switched for about minutes I agr eed to allow him to switch the flow He agreed when he was finished testin g that everything would be put back to the original set points and he would call GC when finished with the test Tom called GC shortly after the flow was put back to TW feed to Griffith He explained that it did not take lo ng and everything was finished to his satisfaction Shortly afterwards at approximately I noticed that the TW feed to Griffith was falling in r ate and El Paso went to flow rate I resent the set point for TW flow to Griffith I called the Griffith plant and spoke to Dave operator at th e plant who was unaware that Tom was in the yard to check on the plant p ressures and flow Dave had not seen any problems with pressures or flow I also called Toms cell phone reached him the second time He was stil l at the site and told me that he had bypassed our meter to Griffith He also told me that the reading from El Paso was false and apologized for not calling to let me know that he was performing additional work I asked hi m to call once again before leaving the site
FYITom Tucker with Citizens has a new cell phone number I changed it in our phone directory and also on the callout sheet hanging on the control board gayle
